message.body: so you're going out tonight?
I'm at a potluck/gamenight. How ya feeling champ?
sounds fun
i'm making myself some bland chicken & rice
Mmmmm. I made empanadas.
You're missing out. We've got a shit-ton of food over here. Hows your arroz con pollo?
satisfying enough
So I'm guessing next week is going to be a little hectic for you
yes & no
starting tomorrow we'll only run the show every other day
Yeah I don't really know anything about what you do. I'm thinking about catching the show next week
the opera? you should
if you've got wednesday afternoon free i might still be able to get a comp for the final dress rehearsal
Again, I'm not sure what that means but I could prolly swing it
um, a comp ticket is one you don't have to pay for... the final dress rehearsal is the last rehearsal (in costume) before a paying audience comes to see the show
Ah, yes I was following the comp part. What time is it at?
eeemmm, 2? 2:30?
Its a possibility. That's a tough time though. If not I'll just snag some tickets up in the auditorium
ok, tomorrow would probably be the last day i could ask about tickets so just lemme know
Its no big deal. I don't mind paying the $10. Is there a particular showing you'd recommend
is it really only $10 to sit in the balcony?
Yeah its the very top on the side. Have you ever been up there?
nope
i've never even gone up to the first balcony
Afraidof heights?
nope, i just rarely have a reason to cross into the front of house
You aristocrats dont hang with those peasants up in the noseblead section.
exactly
How's the rest of your week looking?
what do you mean?
i should have some part of tomorrow night free, wednesday evening, probably thursday, friday's opening, so saturday's completely free
My buddy Brian and I would like to hang out with you
ha, did i meet brian?
Yes, I was just kidding though. He said he'd give me a dollar if I sent that to you. He was the dude with beard
mmm, mmhmm, i was wondering if you always brought your friends along
Eh not usually. That was actually king of weird and I was wondering what you thought of it. At least it was different
it was weird but i actually mostly forgot they were there
Yeah me too, which was good. About ten minutes into the car ride up there I started to think I had made a bad decison
it was definitely a strange one
I was half tempted to just show up with them but decided against it
yeah, that probably woulda been a bad idea
I have lots of bad ideas but the common sense not to see them through
balance is key
Oh so back to your free time. I feel like I have something to do Wednesday but I'm not sure. Thursday would work. Saturday could be good, I think I might have a ride up there that day
saturday's definitely the best bet for me
Ok. How far are you from JFK park?
love park? 4 subway stops / 40 minute walk
Would that work for you? Yes love park as the locals call it
yeah, that should be fine
Have you walked around the museum area before?
nope
i've never even been to love park before
Oh ok you know how to get there though right? If I end up driving I can pick you up but ill prolly catch a ride or the train
i'm sure i can handle it
philly's not that complicated
but thank you for thinking of me
Its pretty simple. Just making sure we end up at the same place. Its a nice time out there, assuming the weather cooperates
fingers crossed
ugh, just found out i have to be in at 8 tomorrow... better get to bed
